targets.expr: count by(cluster, tenant) (count by (namespace) (pulsar_producers_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", namespace!~".*__.*"}))
count by(cluster, tenant) (count by (topic) (pulsar_producers_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*"}))

sum by(cluster, tenant) (increase(pulsar_in_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*"}[1d])) / sum by(cluster, tenant) (increase(pulsar_in_messages_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*"}[1d]))
topk by(cluster, tenant) (10, sum by(ptopic) (pulsar_msg_backlog{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", ptopic !~ ""}))
topk by(cluster, tenant) (10, sum by(ptopic) (pulsar_replication_backlog{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", ptopic !~ ""}))
sum by(remote_cluster, cluster, tenant) (pulsar_replication_backlog{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", remote_cluster!="local"})
sum by(cluster, tenant) (pulsar_replication_backlog{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", remote_cluster!="local"})
topk by(cluster, tenant) (10, sum by(ptopic) (pulsar_subscription_unacked_messages{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", ptopic !~ ""}))
sum by(cluster, tenant, remote_cluster) (pulsar_replication_throughput_in{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", remote_cluster!="local"})
sum by(cluster, tenant) (pulsar_replication_throughput_out{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", remote_cluster!="local"})
topk by(cluster, tenant) (10, sum by(ptopic) (pulsar_storage_size{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$tenant.+", topic!~".*__.*", ptopic !~ ""}))
